title: What Day is it Today?
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Wow, the weather’s so nice today~. Perfect for a picnic, wouldn’t you say~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’s also perfect for napping~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha! I think it’d feel very nice sleeping outside when the weather’s like this. How about we take a nap after lunch?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yay~! Alright then, let’s go ahead and eat then. Since today’s Children’s Day, I made some kashiwa mochi~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I’m excited to try your food out, Kanata-chan… Huh? Wait, this onigiri is…<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ah, this onigiri uses wakame rice. When I heard that today was also wakame day, I added some in~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>K…Kanata-chan!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Wha-!? W-what!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I thought I was the only one that knew about wakame day! I can’t believe it~~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Oh, I’m surprised you were that moved by it. Okay then, eat up~ As soon as we’re full, let’s take a nap together~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
